code: import React from'react';import BackButtonImgHover from'../../assets/imports/button-hover.png';import BackButtonImgInner from'../../assets/imports/button-inner.png';import BackButtonImg from'../../assets/imports/button.png';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import gsap from'gsap';import{useGSAP}from'@gsap/react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProceedButton=_ref=>{let{loc,proceed}=_ref;let navigate=useNavigate();const tlRef=React.useRef(null);useGSAP(()=>{tlRef.current=gsap.timeline({paused:true});tlRef.current.to('.gsap-proceed-inner',{opacity:1,scale:0.8,duration:0.2,ease:'power1.inOut'}).to('.gsap-proceed-outline',{scale:0.8,duration:0.2,ease:'power1.inOut'},'<').to('.proceed__imgs',{marginLeft:'50px',duration:0.2,ease:'power1.inOut'},'<');});const anim=()=>{tlRef.current.play();};const unAnim=()=>{tlRef.current.reverse();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:!!proceed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"proceed",onClick:()=>navigate(loc),children:["Proceed",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onMouseOver:anim,onMouseOut:unAnim,className:"proceed__imgs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{scale:0.75,opacity:0},className:"gsap-proceed-inner",src:BackButtonImgHover,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"gsap-proceed-outline",style:{scale:0.6},src:BackButtonImg,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{translate:'.5px'},src:BackButtonImgInner,alt:""})]})]})});};export default ProceedButton;
